articles.summary: The U.S. dollar index (DXY) remains the swing factor for Bitcoin's direction into year-end. Bitcoin's July peak at $125k lacked signs of a final top, with liquidity trends pointing to a peak closer to mid-2026. A breakout above $115,940 could open higher targets.

articles.title: Bitcoin Spot Liquidity Shrinks: Stablecoin NetFlows Turn Negative Despite ETF Inflows
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Bitcoin is pushing higher, pushing above the $115,000 level and edging closer to critical resistance. Momentum has returned to the market, with traders anticipating a bullish move that could test all-time highs and extend the ongoing bull trend. Bitcoin's resilience at elevated levels fuels the optimism.

articles.title: Bybit Upgrades Convert Features with Exclusive Lucky Draw
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: Bybit Convert will be upgraded from October 1, 2025 until October 17, 2025. It will have improved instant and limit order functionality to deliver faster and smarter trading experiences for users. Bybit is the world's second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume.

articles.title: Ethereum Price Prediction: Can ETH Break $4,300 to Reach the $4,565 Target?
articles.author: Coin Edition
articles.summary: Etherium holds $4,182 support and is eyeing a breakout at $4.300. $3,820 is critical demand zone for the currency. There have been persistent exchange outflows, but accumulation and reduced selling pressure have reduced the selling pressure.

articles.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Month: How Ohioans can stay safe online
articles.author: Lydia Taylor
articles.summary: October is Cybersecurity Awareness Month. FBI reports there were nearly 860,000 complaints of suspected internet crime last year. Consumers lost a reported $12.5 billion because of fraud last year in the U.S. Ohio ranked 7th in the country for suspected Internet crime in 2024. The Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency offers tips to stay safe online.
